verses.verse: וּזְכֹר֙ <S%H2142><s%> Remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בּ֣וֹרְאֶ֔יךָ <S%H1254><s%> now thy Creator בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> in the days בְּחוּרֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H979><s%> of thy youth עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> when לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> come יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> days הָֽרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> while the evil וְהִגִּ֣יעוּ <S%H5060><s%> draw nigh שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> not nor the years אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> when תֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> when thou shalt say אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have לִ֥י בָהֶ֖ם חֵֽפֶץ׃ <S%H2656><s%> I have no pleasure

עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֶחְשַׁ֤ךְ <S%H2821><s%> be not darkened הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> While the sun וְהָא֔וֹר <S%H216><s%> or the light וְהַיָּרֵ֖חַ <S%H3394><s%> or the moon וְהַכּוֹכָבִ֑ים <S%H3556><s%> or the stars וְשָׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> return הֶעָבִ֖ים <S%H5645><s%> nor the clouds אַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> after הַגָּֽשֶׁם׃ <S%H1653><s%> the rain

בַּיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day שֶׁיָּזֻ֙עוּ֙ <S%H2111><s%> shall tremble שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <S%H8104><s%> when the keepers הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וְהִֽתְעַוְּת֖וּ <S%H5791><s%> shall bow אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> men הֶחָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> and the strong וּבָטְל֤וּ <S%H988><s%> cease הַטֹּֽחֲנוֹת֙ <S%H2912><s%> themselves and the grinders כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because מִעֵ֔טוּ <S%H4592><s%> almost some וְחָשְׁכ֥וּ <S%H2821><s%> be darkened הָרֹא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> and those that look out בָּאֲרֻבּֽוֹת׃ <S%H699><s%> of the windows

וְסֻגְּר֤וּ <S%H5462><s%> shall be shut דְלָתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H1817><s%> And the doors בַּשּׁ֔וּק <S%H7784><s%> in the streets בִּשְׁפַ֖ל <S%H8217><s%> is low ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> when the sound הַֽטַּחֲנָ֑ה <S%H2913><s%> of the grinding וְיָקוּם֙ <S%H6965><s%> and he shall rise up לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> at the voice הַצִּפּ֔וֹר <S%H6833><s%> of the bird וְיִשַּׁ֖חוּ <S%H7817><s%> shall be brought low כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> and all the daughters הַשִּֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> of musick

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Furthermore מִגָּבֹ֤הַּ <S%H1364><s%> of [that which is] high יִרָ֙אוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> Also [when] they shall be afraid וְחַתְחַתִּ֣ים <S%H2849><s%> and fears בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [shall be] in the way וְיָנֵ֤אץ <S%H5006><s%> shall flourish הַשָּׁקֵד֙ <S%H8247><s%> and the almond tree וְיִסְתַּבֵּ֣ל <S%H5445><s%> shall be a burden הֶֽחָגָ֔ב <S%H2284><s%> and the grasshopper וְתָפֵ֖ר <S%H6565><s%> shall fail הָֽאֲבִיּוֹנָ֑ה <S%H35><s%> and desire כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֹלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> goeth הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> because man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> home עוֹלָמ֔וֹ <S%H5769><s%> to his long וְסָבְב֥וּ <S%H5437><s%> go about בַשּׁ֖וּק <S%H7784><s%> the streets הַסֹּפְדִֽים׃ <S%H5594><s%> and the mourners

עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Or לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Or ever [יִרחַק כ] (יֵרָתֵק֙ <S%H7368><s%> remove ק) חֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> cord הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the silver וְתָרֻ֖ץ <S%H7533><s%> be broken גֻּלַּ֣ת <S%H1543><s%> bowl הַזָּהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> or the golden וְתִשָּׁ֤בֶר <S%H7665><s%> be broken כַּד֙ <S%H3537><s%> or the pitcher עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַמַּבּ֔וּעַ <S%H4002><s%> at the fountain וְנָרֹ֥ץ <S%H7533><s%> broken הַגַּלְגַּ֖ל <S%H1534><s%> or the wheel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הַבּֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> at the cistern

וְיָשֹׁ֧ב <S%H7725><s%> return הֶעָפָ֛ר <S%H6083><s%> Then shall the dust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the earth כְּשֶׁהָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> it was וְהָר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> as it was and the spirit תָּשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> unto God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who נְתָנָֽהּ׃ <S%H5414><s%> who gave
הֲבֵ֧ל <S%H1892><s%> Vanity הֲבָלִ֛ים <S%H1892><s%> of vanities אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith הַקּוֹהֶ֖לֶת <S%H6953><s%> the preacher הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> all [is] vanity

וְיֹתֵ֕ר <S%H3148><s%> And moreover שֶׁהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> to being קֹהֶ֖לֶת <S%H6953><s%> because the preacher חָכָ֑ם <S%H2450><s%> was wise ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> also לִמַּד־ <S%H3925><s%> he still taught דַּ֙עַת֙ <S%H1847><s%> knowledge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְאִזֵּ֣ן <S%H238><s%> give וְחִקֵּ֔ר <S%H2713><s%> and sought out תִּקֵּ֖ן <S%H8626><s%> [and] set in order מְשָׁלִ֥ים <S%H4912><s%> proverbs הַרְבֵּֽה׃ <S%H7235><s%> many

בִּקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> sought קֹהֶ֔לֶת <S%H6953><s%> The preacher לִמְצֹ֖א <S%H4672><s%> to find out דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> words חֵ֑פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> acceptable וְכָת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> and [that which was] written יֹ֖שֶׁר <S%H3476><s%> [was] upright דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> [even] words אֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> of truth

דִּבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> The words חֲכָמִים֙ <S%H2450><s%> of the wise כַּדָּ֣רְבֹנ֔וֹת <S%H1861><s%> [are] as goads וּֽכְמַשְׂמְר֥וֹת <S%H4930><s%> and as nails נְטוּעִ֖ים <S%H5193><s%> fastened בַּעֲלֵ֣י <S%H1167><s%> [by] the masters אֲסֻפּ֑וֹת <S%H627><s%> of assemblies נִתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> [which] are given מֵרֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> shepherd אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> from one

וְיֹתֵ֥ר <S%H3148><s%> And further מֵהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> by these בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> my son הִזָּהֵ֑ר <S%H2094><s%> be admonished עֲשׂ֨וֹת <S%H6213><s%> of making סְפָרִ֤ים <S%H5612><s%> books הַרְבֵּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> many אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no קֵ֔ץ <S%H7093><s%> [there is] no end וְלַ֥הַג <S%H3854><s%> study הַרְבֵּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> and much יְגִעַ֥ת <S%H3024><s%> [is] a weariness בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> of the flesh

ס֥וֹף <S%H5490><s%> the conclusion דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> of the whole matter הַכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all נִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> Let us hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> God יְרָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> Fear וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹתָ֣יו <S%H4687><s%> his commandments שְׁמ֔וֹר <S%H8104><s%> and keep כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> for this [is] the whole [duty] of man

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H4639><s%> every work הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> For God יָבִ֥א <S%H935><s%> shall bring בְמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> into judgment עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything נֶעְלָ֑ם <S%H5956><s%> with every secret thing אִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> whether [it be] good וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> or whether [it be] evil
